6521 #define DCLOG_VERBOSE(vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CLOG_VERBOSE(vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6522 #define DCVLOG(vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CVLOG(vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6523 // Conditional logs
6524 #define DCLOG_IF(condition, LEVEL, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CLOG_IF(condition, LEVEL, __VA_ARGS__)
6525 #define DCVLOG_IF(condition, vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CVLOG_IF(condition, vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6526 // Hit counts based logs
6527 #define DCLOG_EVERY_N(n, LEVEL, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CLOG_EVERY_N(n, LEVEL, __VA_ARGS__)
6528 #define DCVLOG_EVERY_N(n, vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CVLOG_EVERY_N(n, vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6529 #define DCLOG_AFTER_N(n, LEVEL, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CLOG_AFTER_N(n, LEVEL, __VA_ARGS__)
6530 #define DCVLOG_AFTER_N(n, vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CVLOG_AFTER_N(n, vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6531 #define DCLOG_N_TIMES(n, LEVEL, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CLOG_N_TIMES(n, LEVEL, __VA_ARGS__)
6532 #define DCVLOG_N_TIMES(n, vlevel, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CVLOG_N_TIMES(n, vlevel, __VA_ARGS__)
6533 //
6534 // Default Debug Only Loggers macro using CLOG(), CLOG_VERBOSE() and CVLOG() macros
6535 //
6536 // undef existing
6537 #undef DLOG
6538 #undef DVLOG
6539 #undef DLOG_IF
6540 #undef DVLOG_IF
6541 #undef DLOG_EVERY_N
6542 #undef DVLOG_EVERY_N
6543 #undef DLOG_AFTER_N
6544 #undef DVLOG_AFTER_N
6545 #undef DLOG_N_TIMES
6546 #undef DVLOG_N_TIMES
6547 // Normal logs
6548 #define DLOG(LEVEL) DCLOG(LEVEL, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6549 #define DVLOG(vlevel) DCVLOG(vlevel, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6550 // Conditional logs
6551 #define DLOG_IF(condition, LEVEL) DCLOG_IF(condition, LEVEL, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6552 #define DVLOG_IF(condition, vlevel) DCVLOG_IF(condition, vlevel, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6553 // Hit counts based logs
6554 #define DLOG_EVERY_N(n, LEVEL) DCLOG_EVERY_N(n, LEVEL, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6555 #define DVLOG_EVERY_N(n, vlevel) DCVLOG_EVERY_N(n, vlevel, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6556 #define DLOG_AFTER_N(n, LEVEL) DCLOG_AFTER_N(n, LEVEL, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6557 #define DVLOG_AFTER_N(n, vlevel) DCVLOG_AFTER_N(n, vlevel, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6558 #define DLOG_N_TIMES(n, LEVEL) DCLOG_N_TIMES(n, LEVEL, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6559 #define DVLOG_N_TIMES(n, vlevel) DCVLOG_N_TIMES(n, vlevel, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6560 // Check macros
6561 #undef CCHECK
6562 #undef CPCHECK
6563 #undef CCHECK_EQ
6564 #undef CCHECK_NE
6565 #undef CCHECK_LT
6566 #undef CCHECK_GT
6567 #undef CCHECK_LE
6568 #undef CCHECK_GE
6569 #undef CCHECK_BOUNDS
6570 #undef CCHECK_NOTNULL
6571 #undef CCHECK_STRCASEEQ
6572 #undef CCHECK_STRCASENE
6573 #undef CHECK
6574 #undef PCHECK
6575 #undef CHECK_EQ
6576 #undef CHECK_NE
6577 #undef CHECK_LT
6578 #undef CHECK_GT
6579 #undef CHECK_LE
6580 #undef CHECK_GE
6581 #undef CHECK_BOUNDS
6582 #undef CHECK_NOTNULL
6583 #undef CHECK_STRCASEEQ
6584 #undef CHECK_STRCASENE
6585 #define CCHECK(condition, ...) CLOG_IF(!(condition), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) << "Check failed: [" << #condition << "] "
6586 #define CPCHECK(condition, ...) CPLOG_IF(!(condition), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) << "Check failed: [" << #condition << "] "
6587 #define CHECK(condition) CCHECK(condition, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6588 #define PCHECK(condition) CPCHECK(condition, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6589 #define CCHECK_EQ(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a == b, __VA_ARGS__)
6590 #define CCHECK_NE(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a != b, __VA_ARGS__)
6591 #define CCHECK_LT(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a < b, __VA_ARGS__)
6592 #define CCHECK_GT(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a > b, __VA_ARGS__)
6593 #define CCHECK_LE(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a <= b, __VA_ARGS__)
6594 #define CCHECK_GE(a, b, ...) CCHECK(a >= b, __VA_ARGS__)
6595 #define CCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max, ...) CCHECK(val >= min && val <= max, __VA_ARGS__)
6596 #define CHECK_EQ(a, b) CCHECK_EQ(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6597 #define CHECK_NE(a, b) CCHECK_NE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6598 #define CHECK_LT(a, b) CCHECK_LT(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6599 #define CHECK_GT(a, b) CCHECK_GT(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6600 #define CHECK_LE(a, b) CCHECK_LE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6601 #define CHECK_GE(a, b) CCHECK_GE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6602 #define CHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max) CCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6603 namespace el {
6604 namespace base {
6605 namespace utils {
6606 template <typename T>
6607 static T* checkNotNull(T* ptr, const char* name, const char* loggers, ...) {
6608  CLOG_IF(ptr == nullptr, FATAL, loggers) << "Check failed: [" << name << " != nullptr]";
6609  return ptr;
6610 }
6611 } // namespace utils
6612 } // namespace base
6613 } // namespace el
6614 #define CCHECK_NOTNULL(ptr, ...) el::base::utils::checkNotNull(ptr, #ptr, __VA_ARGS__)
6615 #define CCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2, ...) CLOG_IF(!el::base::utils::Str::cStringEq(str1, str2), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) \
6616  << "Check failed: [" << #str1 << " == " << #str2 << "] "
6617 #define CCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2, ...) CLOG_IF(el::base::utils::Str::cStringEq(str1, str2), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) \
6618  << "Check failed: [" << #str1 << " != " << #str2 << "] "
6619 #define CCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2, ...) CLOG_IF(!el::base::utils::Str::cStringCaseEq(str1, str2), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) \
6620  << "Check failed: [" << #str1 << " == " << #str2 << "] "
6621 #define CCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2, ...) CLOG_IF(el::base::utils::Str::cStringCaseEq(str1, str2), FATAL, __VA_ARGS__) \
6622  << "Check failed: [" << #str1 << " != " << #str2 << "] "
6623 #define CHECK_NOTNULL(ptr) CCHECK_NOTNULL(ptr, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6624 #define CHECK_STREQ(str1, str2) CCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6625 #define CHECK_STRNE(str1, str2) CCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6626 #define CHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2) CCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6627 #define CHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2) CCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6628 #undef DCCHECK
6629 #undef DCCHECK_EQ
6630 #undef DCCHECK_NE
6631 #undef DCCHECK_LT
6632 #undef DCCHECK_GT
6633 #undef DCCHECK_LE
6634 #undef DCCHECK_GE
6635 #undef DCCHECK_BOUNDS
6636 #undef DCCHECK_NOTNULL
6637 #undef DCCHECK_STRCASEEQ
6638 #undef DCCHECK_STRCASENE
6639 #undef DCPCHECK
6640 #undef DCHECK
6641 #undef DCHECK_EQ
6642 #undef DCHECK_NE
6643 #undef DCHECK_LT
6644 #undef DCHECK_GT
6645 #undef DCHECK_LE
6646 #undef DCHECK_GE
6647 #undef DCHECK_BOUNDS_
6648 #undef DCHECK_NOTNULL
6649 #undef DCHECK_STRCASEEQ
6650 #undef DCHECK_STRCASENE
6651 #undef DPCHECK
6652 #define DCCHECK(condition, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK(condition, __VA_ARGS__)
6653 #define DCCHECK_EQ(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_EQ(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6654 #define DCCHECK_NE(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_NE(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6655 #define DCCHECK_LT(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_LT(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6656 #define DCCHECK_GT(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_GT(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6657 #define DCCHECK_LE(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_LE(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6658 #define DCCHECK_GE(a, b, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_GE(a, b, __VA_ARGS__)
6659 #define DCCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max, __VA_ARGS__)
6660 #define DCCHECK_NOTNULL(ptr, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_NOTNULL(ptr, __VA_ARGS__)
6661 #define DCCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2, __VA_ARGS__)
6662 #define DCCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2, __VA_ARGS__)
6663 #define DCCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2, __VA_ARGS__)
6664 #define DCCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2, __VA_ARGS__)
6665 #define DCPCHECK(condition, ...) if (ELPP_DEBUG_LOG) CPCHECK(condition, __VA_ARGS__)
6666 #define DCHECK(condition) DCCHECK(condition, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6667 #define DCHECK_EQ(a, b) DCCHECK_EQ(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6668 #define DCHECK_NE(a, b) DCCHECK_NE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6669 #define DCHECK_LT(a, b) DCCHECK_LT(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6670 #define DCHECK_GT(a, b) DCCHECK_GT(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6671 #define DCHECK_LE(a, b) DCCHECK_LE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6672 #define DCHECK_GE(a, b) DCCHECK_GE(a, b, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6673 #define DCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max) DCCHECK_BOUNDS(val, min, max, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6674 #define DCHECK_NOTNULL(ptr) DCCHECK_NOTNULL(ptr, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6675 #define DCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2) DCCHECK_STREQ(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6676 #define DCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2) DCCHECK_STRNE(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6677 #define DCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2) DCCHECK_STRCASEEQ(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6678 #define DCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2) DCCHECK_STRCASENE(str1, str2, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6679 #define DPCHECK(condition) DCPCHECK(condition, ELPP_CURR_FILE_LOGGER_ID)
6680 #if defined(ELPP_DISABLE_DEFAULT_CRASH_HANDLING)
6681 # define ELPP_USE_DEF_CRASH_HANDLER false
6682 #else
6683 # define ELPP_USE_DEF_CRASH_HANDLER true
6684 #endif // defined(ELPP_DISABLE_DEFAULT_CRASH_HANDLING)
6685 #define ELPP_CRASH_HANDLER_INIT
6686 #define ELPP_INIT_EASYLOGGINGPP(val)\
6687  ELPP_INITI_BASIC_DECLR\
6688  namespace el {\
6689  namespace base {\
6690  el::base::type::StoragePointer elStorage(val);\
6691  }\
6692  el::base::debug::CrashHandler elCrashHandler(ELPP_USE_DEF_CRASH_HANDLER);\
6693  }
6694 
6695 #if ELPP_ASYNC_LOGGING
6696 # define INITIALIZE_EASYLOGGINGPP\
6697  ELPP_INIT_EASYLOGGINGPP(new el::base::Storage(el::LogBuilderPtr(new el::base::DefaultLogBuilder()),\
6698  new el::base::AsyncDispatchWorker()))\
6699 
6700 #else
6701 # define INITIALIZE_EASYLOGGINGPP\
6702  ELPP_INIT_EASYLOGGINGPP(new el::base::Storage(el::LogBuilderPtr(new el::base::DefaultLogBuilder())))
6703 #endif // ELPP_ASYNC_LOGGING
6704 #define INITIALIZE_NULL_EASYLOGGINGPP\
6705  ELPP_INITI_BASIC_DECLR\
6706  namespace el {\
6707  namespace base {\
6708  el::base::type::StoragePointer elStorage;\
6709  }\
6710  el::base::debug::CrashHandler elCrashHandler(ELPP_USE_DEF_CRASH_HANDLER);\
6711  }
6712 // NOTE: no ELPP_INITI_BASIC_DECLR when sharing - causes double free corruption on external symbols
6713 #define SHARE_EASYLOGGINGPP(initializedStorage)\
6714  namespace el {\
6715  namespace base {\
6716  el::base::type::StoragePointer elStorage(initializedStorage);\
6717  }\
6718  el::base::debug::CrashHandler elCrashHandler(ELPP_USE_DEF_CRASH_HANDLER);\
6719  }
6720 
6721 #if defined(ELPP_UNICODE)
6722 # define START_EASYLOGGINGPP(argc, argv) el::Helpers::setArgs(argc, argv); std::locale::global(std::locale(""))
6723 #else
6724 # define START_EASYLOGGINGPP(argc, argv) el::Helpers::setArgs(argc, argv)
6725 #endif // defined(ELPP_UNICODE)
6726 #endif // EASYLOGGINGPP_H
